title: Cigna
shortDescription: National health insurer providing autism service coverage through various plan options.
description: Cigna is a global health services company offering health insurance plans in Florida through employer groups, individual markets, and government programs. Cigna plans generally include benefits for autism spectrum disorder treatment, including behavioral health services, ABA therapy, and developmental therapies. The company has expanded its autism coverage in recent years and offers care management support for families navigating autism services. Coverage specifics depend on your particular plan.
requirements: Prior authorization typically required for ABA
In-network providers recommended for maximum benefits
Treatment plans may require periodic review
